With the {{tt|scalar}} ABI tag, data-parallel types are equivalent to a single element type. However, the full {{rlpt|simd}} and {{rlpt|simd_mask}} interface is supported and thus eases development of generic code.

===Notes===

{{tt|scalar}} is ''not'' an alias to {{c|fixed_size&lt;1&gt;}}.
